participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and creative, Emily enjoys spending time with her family and engaging in artistic activities.
participant_1.background: I've been with my husband for 10 years, and we still love to decorate for Christmas together. I take a moment to myself and listen to some calming music. I remember listening to pearl jam with my dad in the car. I like to take cold showers. My mom was a hairdresser.

participant_2.name: Jack
participant_2.personality: Friendly and adventurous, Jack is eager to meet new people and explore his new surroundings.
participant_2.background: I am of average weight. I don't really care for social media; I'm more interested in getting to know the people in my new city. I find that getting lost in a good book takes me back to my childhood. I love all animals, but I have a special place in my heart for dogs. I have a George Foreman grill at home.

content.text: Good thanks! I just moved to a new city and I'm looking for some friends.
Oh nice! I've been in my city for about 10 years now, I'd be happy to show you around!
What are some of your interests?
I love reading, animals, and cooking.
Me too! I'm a big reader and I love my dog. I also love to cook but I'm not very good at it.
Haha! I'm sure you're better than you think.
I hope so! We should definitely get together sometime and cook a meal together.
That would be fun! I'm free this weekend if you are.
Sure! I'll pm you my number and we can figure out the details.
Great! I look forward to it
